file_content.text:
This message comes to you from the Ministry of War's mercenary recruitment divsion. We have recently acquired a non-native soldier for hire, classified by the Science Bureau as a member of a primitive species from a remote Outer Rim system in the Moddell Sector. The Ministry of Logisitics saw fit to license this individual for paid combat duty.
You are receiving this offer due to your recent accomplishments and interest in acquiring military-grade resources. My client eagerly awaits you at the enclosed coordinates on Dromund Kaas. Please visit us at your earliest convenience.
May the Empire prevail, MQ-12, representing Mercenary 11827-BA96, aka "Treek"

Greetings! I represent a soldier for hire with a unique pedigree and skill set. Republic xenobiologists have classified my master as a highly-intelligent non-human hailing from a remote Outer Rim system in the Moddell Sector.
My master seeks employment with an especially gifted individual like yourself, and we have heard you require comrades with extraordinary battle prowess. My master is eager to discuss a mutually-beneficial arrangement at the enclosed coordinates on Corsucant. We hope to see you soon.
Sincerely, RA-30 and "Treek"
